name: A Particular Timeline
description:
Find your way to the end to obtain three extra tracks for the A Particular Timeline album!  Desktop Only.

Game Controls:  Use mouse to click New Game, then use Arrow Keys:  ← → ↑ ↓ to move your character around and navigate menus.  By walking into other characters and objects, you can utilize the Space Bar to speak to other characters and to exit from speaking.
